page.title: 11TRADE 1
page.content:
A survey was done to see what people think of Towcester's{new {shopping centre. {} From the questions that were asked, it appears that most people do their {weekly}shopping at the supermarket there and travel from a radius of about{7 or 8 miles. { Out of about{50}people asked only{1 person said that they didn't like the centre, although several people said that they would like to see more shops there, such as: a drycleaner's, a newsagent's a clothe's shop.
For most people who go to the shopping centre, the supermarket is the main reason for them going.
